title: morning_inverter_power_on_with_display_failure
summary: Morning operation of hybrid solar inverter at the start of the working day.
description: Image documents the action of turning on the hybrid solar inverter at the beginning of the working day. The inverter display is non-functional due to long-term usage exceeding seven years. The system continues to operate under hardware limitations. This record references the inverter shutdown time recorded on the previous day.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
